duties_responsibilities.duty: Manage survey activities such as leveling, topographic mapping, construction layout, and boundary surveys.
Operate and adjust Trimble survey equipment, including total station, data collector, and GPS equipment.
Review survey field calculations, maintain work-issued vehicle and survey equipment, and follow safety protocols.
Work independently or collaboratively on survey projects, read and interpret engineering plans, and attend training events.
Mentor and assist survey crew members with their new hire training plan and professional development.

education_certification.credential: At least 5 years of experience in a Survey Crew Chief role
